originContent: A desktop and mobile UI for [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code), Anthropic's official CLI for AI-assisted coding. You can use it locally or remotely to view your active projects and sessions in claude code and make changes to them the same way you would do it in claude code CLI. This gives you a proper interface that works everywhere.
translatedContent: A desktop and mobile UI for [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code), Anthropic's official CLI for AI-assisted coding. You can use it locally or remotely to view your active projects and sessions in claude code and make changes to them the same way you would do it in claude code CLI. This gives you a proper interface that works everywhere.

originContent: Main interface showing project overview and chat
translatedContent: Main interface showing project overview and chat

originContent: - **Responsive Design** - Works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile so you can also use Claude Code from mobile
translatedContent: - **Responsive Design** - Works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile so you can also use Claude Code from mobile

originContent: - **Interactive Chat Interface** - Built-in chat interface for seamless communication with Claude Code
translatedContent: - **Interactive Chat Interface** - Built-in chat interface for seamless communication with Claude Code

originContent: - **Integrated Shell Terminal** - Direct access to Claude Code CLI through built-in shell functionality
translatedContent: - **Integrated Shell Terminal** - Direct access to Claude Code CLI through built-in shell functionality

originContent: - **File Explorer** - Interactive file tree with syntax highlighting and live editing
translatedContent: - **File Explorer** - Interactive file tree with syntax highlighting and live editing

originContent: - **Git Explorer** - View, stage and commit your changes. You can also switch branches
translatedContent: - **Git Explorer** - View, stage and commit your changes. You can also switch branches

originContent: - **Session Management** - Resume conversations, manage multiple sessions, and track history
translatedContent: - **Session Management** - Resume conversations, manage multiple sessions, and track history

originContent: The application will start at the port you specified in your .env
translatedContent: The application will start at the port you specified in your .env

originContent: **🔒 Important Notice**: All Claude Code tools are **disabled by default**. This prevents potentially harmful operations from running automatically.
translatedContent: **🔒 Important Notice**: All Claude Code tools are **disabled by default**. This prevents potentially harmful operations from running automatically.

originContent: To use Claude Code's full functionality, you'll need to manually enable tools:
translatedContent: To use Claude Code's full functionality, you'll need to manually enable tools:

originContent: 1. **Open Tools Settings** - Click the gear icon in the sidebar
translatedContent: 1. **Open Tools Settings** - Click the gear icon in the sidebar

originContent: 3. **Enable Selectively** - Turn on only the tools you need
translatedContent: 3. **Enable Selectively** - Turn on only the tools you need

originContent: 4. **Apply Settings** - Your preferences are saved locally
translatedContent: 4. **Apply Settings** - Your preferences are saved locally

originContent: *Tools Settings interface - enable only what you need*
translatedContent: *Tools Settings interface - enable only what you need*

originContent: **Recommended approach**: Start with basic tools enabled and add more as needed. You can always adjust these settings later.
translatedContent: **Recommended approach**: Start with basic tools enabled and add more as needed. You can always adjust these settings later.

originContent: The UI automatically discovers Claude Code projects from `~/.claude/projects/` and provides:
translatedContent: The UI automatically discovers Claude Code projects from `~/.claude/projects/` and provides:

originContent: - **Visual Project Browser** - All available projects with metadata and session counts
translatedContent: - **Visual Project Browser** - All available projects with metadata and session counts

originContent: - **Project Actions** - Rename, delete, and organize projects
translatedContent: - **Project Actions** - Rename, delete, and organize projects

originContent: - **Smart Navigation** - Quick access to recent projects and sessions
translatedContent: - **Smart Navigation** - Quick access to recent projects and sessions

originContent: - **Use responsive chat or Claude Code CLI** - You can either use the adapted chat interface or use the shell button to connect to Claude Code CLI.
translatedContent: - **Use responsive chat or Claude Code CLI** - You can either use the adapted chat interface or use the shell button to connect to Claude Code CLI.

originContent: - **Real-time Communication** - Stream responses from Claude with WebSocket connection
translatedContent: - **Real-time Communication** - Stream responses from Claude with WebSocket connection

originContent: - **Session Management** - Resume previous conversations or start fresh sessions
translatedContent: - **Session Management** - Resume previous conversations or start fresh sessions

originContent: - **Message History** - Complete conversation history with timestamps and metadata
translatedContent: - **Message History** - Complete conversation history with timestamps and metadata

originContent: - **Multi-format Support** - Text, code blocks, and file references
translatedContent: - **Multi-format Support** - Text, code blocks, and file references

originContent: - **Interactive File Tree** - Browse project structure with expand/collapse navigation
translatedContent: - **Interactive File Tree** - Browse project structure with expand/collapse navigation

originContent: - **Live File Editing** - Read, modify, and save files directly in the interface
translatedContent: - **Live File Editing** - Read, modify, and save files directly in the interface

originContent: - **Syntax Highlighting** - Support for multiple programming languages
translatedContent: - **Syntax Highlighting** - Support for multiple programming languages

originContent: - **File Operations** - Create, rename, delete files and directories
translatedContent: - **File Operations** - Create, rename, delete files and directories

originContent: - **Session Organization** - Group sessions by project and timestamp
translatedContent: - **Session Organization** - Group sessions by project and timestamp

originContent: - **Session Actions** - Rename, delete, and export conversation history
translatedContent: - **Session Actions** - Rename, delete, and export conversation history

originContent: - **Cross-device Sync** - Access sessions from any device
translatedContent: - **Cross-device Sync** - Access sessions from any device

originContent: - **Responsive Design** - Optimized for all screen sizes
translatedContent: - **Responsive Design** - Optimized for all screen sizes

originContent: - **Touch-friendly Interface** - Swipe gestures and touch navigation
translatedContent: - **Touch-friendly Interface** - Swipe gestures and touch navigation

originContent: - **Mobile Navigation** - Bottom tab bar for easy thumb navigation
translatedContent: - **Mobile Navigation** - Bottom tab bar for easy thumb navigation

originContent: - **Adaptive Layout** - Collapsible sidebar and smart content prioritization
translatedContent: - **Adaptive Layout** - Collapsible sidebar and smart content prioritization

originContent: - **Add shortcut to Home Screen** - Add a shortcut to your home screen and the app will behave like a PWA
translatedContent: - **Add shortcut to Home Screen** - Add a shortcut to your home screen and the app will behave like a PWA
- **Express Server** - RESTful API with static file serving

originContent: - **Express Server** - RESTful API with static file serving
translatedContent: - **WebSocket Server** - Communication for chats and project refresh

originContent: - **WebSocket Server** - Communication for chats and project refresh
translatedContent: - **Claude CLI Integration** - Process spawning and management

originContent: - **Claude CLI Integration** - Process spawning and management
translatedContent: - **Session Management** - JSONL parsing and conversation persistence

originContent: - **Session Management** - JSONL parsing and conversation persistence
translatedContent: - **File System API** - Exposing file browser for projects

originContent: - **File System API** - Exposing file browser for projects

translatedContent: - **CodeMirror** - Advanced code editor with syntax highlighting

originContent: - **CodeMirror** - Advanced code editor with syntax highlighting

translatedContent: We welcome contributions! Please follow these guidelines:

originContent: We welcome contributions! Please follow these guidelines:

translatedContent: 1. **Make your changes** following the existing code style

originContent: 1. **Make your changes** following the existing code style
translatedContent: 2. **Test thoroughly** - ensure all features work correctly

originContent: 2. **Test thoroughly** - ensure all features work correctly
translatedContent: 3. **Run quality checks**: `npm run lint && npm run format`

originContent: 3. **Run quality checks**: `npm run lint && npm run format`

translatedContent: 5. **Push** to your branch: `git push origin feature/amazing-feature`

originContent: 5. **Push** to your branch: `git push origin feature/amazing-feature`

translatedContent: - **New features** - Enhance functionality (discuss in issues first)

originContent: - **New features** - Enhance functionality (discuss in issues first)

translatedContent: **Problem**: The UI shows no projects or empty project list

originContent: **Problem**: The UI shows no projects or empty project list

translatedContent: - Run `claude` command in at least one project directory to initialize

originContent: - Run `claude` command in at least one project directory to initialize
translatedContent: - Verify `~/.claude/projects/` directory exists and has proper permissions

originContent: - Verify `~/.claude/projects/` directory exists and has proper permissions

translatedContent: **Problem**: Files not loading, permission errors, empty directories

originContent: **Problem**: Files not loading, permission errors, empty directories

translatedContent: - Check project directory permissions (`ls -la` in terminal)

originContent: - Check project directory permissions (`ls -la` in terminal)
translatedContent: - Verify the project path exists and is accessible

originContent: - Verify the project path exists and is accessible
translatedContent: - Review server console logs for detailed error messages

originContent: - Review server console logs for detailed error messages
translatedContent: - Ensure you're not trying to access system directories outside project scope

originContent: - Ensure you're not trying to access system directories outside project scope
